Huawei: ip ip-prefix SYSTEM permit 10.2.65.10 32 greater-equal 32 less-equal 32
Comments: Both configurations define a prefix list with the same matching criteria.

Huawei:
route-policy EXPORT_to_OSPF permit node 10
 if-match protocol direct
 if-match ip-prefix SYSTEM
Comments: Both configurations define matching criteria based on the protocol and prefix list.
The Nokia configuration specifies an action to accept routes and set the LSA type, while the Huawei configuration sets the cost type to external.
